sentences.english: Pakistan"s Chief of Army Staff Gen Ashfaq Parvez Kayani was also present during the ceremony."
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦陸軍總參謀長也出席了授獎儀式。

sentences.english: He made a speech on the prize-giving ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 他在授獎儀式上講了話。

sentences.english: The presentation was to be made at a luncheon .
sentences.chinese: 授獎儀式在一個午宴上進行。

sentences.english: The presentation of prizes will begin at three o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 授獎儀式將在三點鐘開始。

sentences.english: The John Templeton Foundation awards grants in the field.
sentences.chinese: 約翰特普萊登基金在此領域授獎。

sentences.english: The science fair culminated in the awarding of prizes.
sentences.chinese: 科學博覽會在授獎時達到了高潮。
